苍山洱海 · 云南

Gain driving independence!

玉龙雪山 · 云南

Best in class Certified Driver Rehabilitation!

Professional Assessment

Providing comprehensive medical screening, testing, and reporting for driving needs across the age span: Driving Readiness Screening for Teens; Potential-to-Drive Clinical Assessments for Adults; Behind-The-Wheel Safe Driving Assessment. Individual Driving Plans (IDP) with recommendations based on supporting evidence can be utilized to get further training and support services.

Mobile Services

Serving the Austin-Metro Region and beyond for convenience and necessity. Most clients prefer assessment, training, and consultation in a comfortable and familiar setting whenever possible. If services are requested through a clinic, hospital, or driving school those options can be discussed as a part of the IDP. Due to payer restrictions and for liability reasons, some service limitations may be identified.

Support and Education

Determining if driving or other community mobility options is the best and safest choice for yourself or a family member can be a difficult experience. Clear, regular communication as well as therapeutic support is a necessary component to assisting with these difficult decision making processes. In cases where equipment or family-assisted driver training may be beneficial, guidance can be offered.
